title: Average regular season home attendance of the Cleveland Browns 2008 to 2019
summary: In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.

Average attendance is roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Average attendance, about 71242.0 was reported at Year 2013
Minimum Average attendance about 63882.0 was reached at Year 2017
min_summary: Overall Average attendance has increased over the Year.

Average attendance is roughly constant from 2010 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
